headline: Economic fears of investors are here — and fed by Trump’s reaction
summary: For months, the U.S. economy appeared to be weathering the disruptive effects of President Donald Trump’s trade and immigration policies. But over the course of 72 hours, that sunny outlook darkened, as the latest government data this week showed the president’s revolutionary remaking of the world’s largest economy had hit a snag.Subscribe to The Post Most newsletter for the most important and interesting stories from The Washington Post.
